dcterms:creator: B. Brogliato
A. Polyakov
D. EÔ¨Åmov
dcterms:description: The dataset contains the implicit discretization of the supertwisting sliding-mode control algorithm, which is used for robust control of systems with disturbances.
dcterms:title: Super-Twisting Controller (STC)

dcterms:creator: R. Seeber
M. Reichhartinger
dcterms:description: This dataset describes the conditioned super-twisting algorithm, which is designed for systems with saturated control action to mitigate windup effects.
dcterms:title: Conditioned Super-Twisting Controller

dcterms:creator: X. Yang
X. Xiong
Z. Zou
Y. Lou
dcterms:description: This dataset presents the semi-implicit Euler digital implementation of the conditioned super-twisting algorithm, focusing on actuation saturation.
dcterms:title: Semi-Implicit Discretization

dcterms:creator: A. Hanan
A. Levant
A. Jbara
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses a low-chattering discretization of sliding mode control, aimed at reducing chattering effects in control systems.
dcterms:title: Low-Chattering Discretization

dcterms:creator: S. Koch
M. Reichhartinger
dcterms:description: This dataset provides discrete-time equivalents of the super-twisting algorithm, focusing on its implementation in control systems.
dcterms:title: Implicit Discretization of the Super-Twisting Algorithm

dcterms:creator: M. Reichhartinger
S. Vogl
S. Koch
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses anti-windup schemes for discrete-time super-twisting algorithms, aimed at improving control performance under saturation.
dcterms:title: Anti-Windup Schemes

dcterms:creator: Y. Shtessel
C. Edwards
L. Fridman
A. Levant
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a comprehensive overview of sliding mode control and observation techniques.
dcterms:title: Sliding Mode Control and Observation

dcterms:creator: M.R. Mojallizadeh
B. Brogliato
V. Acary
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on time-discretizations of differentiators, including the design of implicit algorithms and comparative analysis.
dcterms:title: Time-Discretizations of Differentiators

dcterms:creator: R. Seeber
M. Horn
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a stability proof for a well-established super-twisting parameter setting, contributing to the understanding of stability in control systems.
dcterms:title: Stability Proof for a Well-Established Super-Twisting Parameter Setting

dcterms:creator: R. Seeber
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the semi-implicit Euler digital implementation of the conditioned super-twisting algorithm with actuation saturation.
dcterms:title: Discussion on Semi-Implicit Euler Digital Implementation
